content:
User: Get It in the Cloud: This has to live on GCP to count as MVP. Minimize human steps—assume the MacBook’s set up to your specs (per setup_environment.py). Terraform’s ready; automate it like last time and give us a live URL to prove it.

Grok: Show Us: Update the progress tracker to 100% with cloud verification (e.g., endpoint URL) so we can see it in action.
